headline: Stock Market Today, Dec. 16: Energy Stocks Slide as Oil Drops to Multi-Year Lows
summary: On Dec. 16, 2025, oil’s slide to multi‑year lows rattled energy leaders and helped pull major U.S. benchmarks off recent highs.
